The castle defenses are powerless against the giant robots, and the king and queen are killed in the attack....

Bad guys with machine guns provide a high level of shooting action.

Lowman, the "head" of the Totem, needs some "muscle" as he calls it, to bring them back. He finds a pencil on the desk and makes it come to life....

Will you help the Confederation to victory, or go down in infamy? Wing Commander is a space combat ...

game.name: WireHead

Now, a mad scientist wants to dissect Ned's head to discover the secrets of mind control! Using Ned's remote controller, you've got to escape the evil clutches of "Heels", the deadly seductress bent on prying open Ned's noodle.
